data.price: Manneen keessan keessa taa’aa; akka mul’ifannaa bara wallaalaa duriitti miidhagina keessan hin mul’isinaa; salaatas sirnaan dhaabaa; zakaas kennaa; Rabbiifi ergamaa Isaatiifis ajajamaa,Yaa maatii nabiyyichaa! Wanti Rabbiin fedhu xurii isin irraa deemsisee qulqulleessiinsa isin qulqulleessuu dha.
data.arabic: وَقَرۡنَ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ وَلَا تَبَرَّجۡنَ تَبَرُّجَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَأَقِمۡنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتِينَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِعۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمۡ تَطۡهِيرٗا

dua.name: Ayat al-Tathir
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes spiritual purification of the Prophet's household (Ahl al-Bayt), highlighting divine selection and spiritual cleansing. Significant in both theological and spiritual interpretations.
